name: children
description: Items to render

name: itemHeight
description: The height of the carousel

name: slideSpacing
description: Adds spacing between slides

name: arrowsInside
description: Renders the arrows inside or outside the carousel

name: renderLoading
description: The loading component to display when the carousel is not ready

name: className
description: The css class for the root element

name: itemsToShow
description: Number of visible items

name: verticalMode
description: Display the Carousel in a vertical layout

name: isRTL
description: Flip right to left

name: pagination
description: Show dots for paging

name: transitionMs
description: Animation speed

name: easing
description: Transition easing pattern

name: tiltEasing
description: Transition easing pattern for the tilt

name: enableTilt
description: The 'bump' animation when reaching the last item

name: itemsToScroll
description: Number of items to scroll

name: breakPoints
description: Collection of objects with a width, itemsToShow, and itemsToScroll

name: initialActiveIndex
description: The initial active index when the component mounts

name: initialFirstItem
description: **DEPRECATED - use initialActiveIndex instead** The first item when the component mounts

name: showArrows
description: Show the arrow buttons

name: showEmptySlots
description: Show empty slots when children.length < itemsToShow (not compatible with verticalMode yet!)

name: disableArrowsOnEnd
description: Disables the arrow button when there are no more items

name: focusOnSelect
description: Go to item on click

name: itemPosition
description: Position the element relative to its wrapper (use the consts object: START, CENTER, or END)

name: outerSpacing
description: A margin at the beginning and at the end of the carousel

name: enableSwipe
description: Enable or disable swipe

name: enableMouseSwipe
description: Enable or disable mouse swipe

name: preventDefaultTouchmoveEvent
description: Prevent page scroll on touchmove

name: enableAutoPlay
description: Enable or disable auto play

name: autoPlaySpeed
description: Set auto play speed (ms)

name: enableNextEndBack
description: Enable or disable the nextEndBack feature

name: autoTabIndexVisibleItems
description: Automatically inject `tabIndex:0` to visible items

name: style
description: The style object for the root element

name: renderArrow
description: A render prop for the arrow component

name: renderPagination
description: A render prop for the pagination component

name: onChange
description: A callback for the change of an item

name: onNextStart
description: A callback for the beginning of the next transition

name: onPrevStart
description: A callback for the beginning of the prev transition

name: onNextEnd
description: A callback for the end of the next transition

name: onPrevEnd
description: A callback for the end of the prev transition

name: onResize
description: A callback for the 'slider-container' resize
